definition: reformism (i.e. favoring gradual change as opposed to revolution)

sentences.english: Our design originated from the cloth of Zhouzi high school students with some improvement. " The designer told us."
sentences.chinese: 我们的设计源于周治太学生汉服，进行了一些改良。

sentences.english: Adenoviruses have been modified to carry parts of the HIV virus.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒经过改良以携带HIV病毒部件。

sentences.english: His need to implement positive change in the world around him keeps him awake at nights.
sentences.chinese: 夜深了，改良周遭世界的愿望使他夜不能眠。

sentences.english: The optimizaiton of secondary leaf base angle seems crucially important.
sentences.chinese: 其中，倒二叶的叶基角改良最为重要。

sentences.english: Viscosity improvers are polymers with molecules that expand when they get hot.
sentences.chinese: 粘度改良剂是聚合物分子，当他们得到扩大热点。

sentences.english: Jinhui12 is an excellent parental candidate in improving the characteristic of neck-panicle vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 缙恢12号是改良穗颈维管束性状的优良亲本。

sentences.english: This is an improved reliable socialist must face the problem.
sentences.chinese: 这也是戈德曼改良的可靠主义必须要面对的问题。

sentences.english: This has provided valucapable data to stay in soil improvement.
sentences.chinese: 这为土壤改良任务给予了宝贵信息。

sentences.english: With regard to improving the type, use the best male you can afford.
sentences.chinese: 为了改良品相，你需要尽可能地用最好的公猫。

sentences.english: This is the new updated and improved model edition including a container.
sentences.chinese: 这是一款改良版模型包括集装箱。

sentences.english: Using Improved serape-making method, the studies were made on the stomatal density of flag leaves of rice.
sentences.chinese: 用改良刮制法研究了水稻剑叶的气孔密度。

sentences.english: In order to investigate the improved Hospital type Morita Therapy for OCD treatment effect, Morita therapy for OCD is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨改良家庭式森田疗法对强迫症的治疗效果。

sentences.english: The breeding of animals or growing of plants, especially to produce improved stock.
sentences.chinese: 对动物的饲养或植物的种植，尤指为了产生改良品种。

sentences.english: The farmers ploughed money into land improvement last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年农民在土地改良中投入了资金。

sentences.english: Sometimes you just need to improve the wording of an error message.
sentences.chinese: 有时候只要改良某个错误讯息的用字。

sentences.english: Utilizing genetic engineering to improve heredity of Hedysarum mongolicum has become an important practice meanings.
sentences.chinese: 利用基因工程对羊柴进行遗传改良具有重要实践意义。

definition: to create/to inaugurate/to contrive/to build (a mechanism)
to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
